headline: Arizona lawmakers vote to restrict trans athletes, surgeries
author: Jonathan J. Cooper
sentences: PHOENIX — The Arizona Legislature passed bills Thursday to prohibit gender reassignment surgery for minors and ban transgender athletes from playing on girls sports teams, joining a growing list of Republican-controlled states attempting to restrict transgender rights as they gain more visibility in culture and society.
